trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of value the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method searches for.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de valor que o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> procura.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> identifies the type of value provided in the `findValue` parameter for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> identifica o tipo de valor fornecido a `findValue` parâmetro para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> to search an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> collection by subject name, thumbprint, serial number, valid date range, or other value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> para pesquisar um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> coleção por nome de assunto, impressão digital, número de série, intervalo de datas válido ou outro valor.

trans-unit.source: You can use a combination of `FindByTime` value types to find certificates that are valid in a given time range.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar uma combinação de `FindByTime` valor tipos para localizar certificados que são válidos em um intervalo de tempo determinado.

trans-unit.source: The union of certificates returned using FindByTimeValid, FindByTimeNotYetValid, and FindByTimeExpired for a given time represents all certificates in the queried collection.
trans-unit.target: A união de certificados retornadas usando FindByTimeValid, FindByTimeNotYetValid e FindByTimeExpired para um determinado momento representa todos os certificados na coleção consultado.

trans-unit.source: The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, finds only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate information to the console.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir abre o repositório de certificados pessoais do usuário atual, localiza apenas certificados válidos, permite que o usuário selecione um certificado e, em seguida, grava informações de certificado no console.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate you select.
trans-unit.target: A saída depende do certificado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing either the application policy friendly name or the object identifier (OID, or <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" />) of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome amigável da política do aplicativo ou o OID (identificador do objeto ou <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" />) do certificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, "Encrypting File System" or "1.3.6.1.4.1.311.10.3.4" can be used.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode ser usado "Encrypting File System" ou "1.3.6.1.4.1.311.10.3.4".

trans-unit.source: For an application that will be localized, the OID value must be used, because the friendly name is localized.
trans-unit.target: Para um aplicativo que será localizado, o valor de OID deve ser usado, pois o nome amigável está localizado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing either the friendly name or the object identifier (OID, or <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" />) of the certificate policy.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome amigável ou o OID (identificador do objeto ou <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" />) da política de certificação.

trans-unit.source: The best practice is to use the OID, such as "1.3.6.1.4.1.311.10.3.4".
trans-unit.target: A melhor prática é usar o OID, como "1.3.6.1.4.1.311.10.3.4".

trans-unit.source: For an application that will be localized, the OID must be used, because the friendly name is localized.
trans-unit.target: Para um aplicativo que será localizado, o OID deve ser usado, pois o nome amigável está localizado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string describing the extension to find.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a extensão a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (OID) is most commonly used to direct the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method to search for all certificates that have an extension matching that OID value.
trans-unit.target: O OID (identificador de objeto) é mais comumente usado para direcionar o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> para pesquisar todos os certificados que têm uma extensão que corresponde a esse valor OID.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the issuer distinguished name of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome diferenciado do emissor do certificado.

trans-unit.source: This is a more specific search than that provided by the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerName" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Essa é uma pesquisa mais específica do que a fornecida pelo valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerName" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerDistinguishedName" /> value, the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method performs a case-insensitive string comparison for the entire distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Usando o valor de <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerDistinguishedName" />, o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> realiza uma comparação de cadeia de caracteres que não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas para todo o nome diferenciado.

trans-unit.source: Searching by issuer name is a less precise search.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisar pelo nome do emissor é uma pesquisa menos precisa.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the issuer name of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome do emissor do certificado.

trans-unit.source: This is a less specific search than that provided by the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerDistinguishedName" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Essa é uma pesquisa menos específica do que a fornecida pelo valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerDistinguishedName" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerName" /> value, the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: Usando o valor de <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByIssuerName" />, o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> realiza uma comparação de cadeia de caracteres que não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas usando o valor fornecido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pass "MyCA" to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method, it will find all certificates with the issuer name containing that string, regardless of other issuer values.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você passar "MyCA" para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" />, ele encontrará todos os certificados com o nome do emissor que contém essa cadeia de caracteres, independentemente de outros valores do emissor.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be either a string representing the key usage or an integer representing a bit mask containing all the requested key usages.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o uso da chave ou um inteiro que representa um bitmask que contém todos os usos de chave solicitados.

trans-unit.source: For the string value, only one key usage at a time can be specified, but the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method can be used in a cascading sequence to get the intersection of the requested usages.
trans-unit.target: Para o valor de cadeia de caracteres, pode ser especificado apenas um uso de chave por vez, mas o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> pode ser usado em uma sequência em cascata para obter a interseção usos solicitados.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter can be set to "KeyEncipherment" or an integer (0x30 indicates "KeyEncipherment" and "DataEncipherment").
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> pode ser definido como "KeyEncipherment" ou um inteiro (0x30 indica "KeyEncipherment" e "DataEncipherment").

trans-unit.source: Values of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags" /> enumeration can also be used.
trans-unit.target: Valores da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags" /> também podem ser usados.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string that represents the serial number of the certificate as displayed by the certificate dialog box, but without the spaces, or as returned by the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumberString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o número de série do certificado, conforme exibido pela caixa de diálogo do certificado, mas sem os espaços, ou conforme retornado pelo método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumberString" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the subject distinguished name of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome diferenciado da entidade do certificado.

trans-unit.source: This is a more specific search than that provided by the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Essa é uma pesquisa mais específica do que a fornecida pelo valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectDistinguishedName" /> value, the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method performs a case-insensitive string comparison for the entire distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Usando o valor de <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectDistinguishedName" />, o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> realiza uma comparação de cadeia de caracteres que não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas para todo o nome diferenciado.

trans-unit.source: Searching by subject name is a less precise search.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisar pelo nome da entidade é uma pesquisa menos precisa.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the subject key identifier in hexadecimal, such as "F3E815D45E83B8477B9284113C64EF208E897112", as displayed in the UI.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o identificador de chave da entidade em hexadecimal, como "F3E815D45E83B8477B9284113C64EF208E897112", conforme exibido na interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the subject name of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome da entidade do certificado.

trans-unit.source: This is a less specific search than that provided by the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectDistinguishedName" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Essa é uma pesquisa menos específica do que a fornecida pelo valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectDistinguishedName" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName" /> value, the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: Usando o valor de <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName" />, o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> realiza uma comparação de cadeia de caracteres que não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas usando o valor fornecido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pass "MyCert" to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method, it will find all certificates with the subject name containing that string, regardless of other subject values.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você passar "MyCert" para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" />, ele encontrará todos os certificados com o nome da entidade que contêm essa cadeia de caracteres, independentemente de outros valores de entidade.

trans-unit.source: Searching by distinguished name is a more precise search.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisar pelo nome diferenciado é uma pesquisa mais precisa.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the template name of the certificate, such as "ClientAuth".
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome de modelo do certificado, como “ClientAuth”.

trans-unit.source: A template name is an X509 version 3 extension that specifies the uses of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Um nome de modelo é uma extensão X509 extensão 3 que especifica os usos do certificado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a string representing the thumbprint of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> do método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a impressão digital do certificado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value in local time.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser um valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> na hora local.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can find all the certificates that will be valid until the end of the year by eliminating the results of a <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> operation for <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeExpired" /> of the last day of the year from the results of a <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> operation for <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" />.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, é possível encontrar todos os certificados que serão válidos até o fim do ano eliminando os resultados de uma operação <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> para <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeExpired" /> do último dia do ano dos resultados de uma operação <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> para <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value in local time.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser um valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> na hora local.

trans-unit.source: The value does not have to be in the future.
trans-unit.target: O valor não precisa estar no futuro.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeNotYetValid" /> to find certificates that became valid in the current year by taking the intersection of the results of a <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> operation for <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeNotYetValid" /> for the last day of last year with the results of a <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> operation for <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeValid" /> of <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" />.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, é possível usar o <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeNotYetValid" /> para encontrar certificados tornados válidos no ano atual tomando a interseção dos resultados de uma operação <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> para <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeNotYetValid" /> para o último dia do ano passado com os resultados de uma operação <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> para <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindByTimeValid" /> de <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="findValue" /> parameter for the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method must be a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value in local time.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="findValue" /> para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> deve ser um valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> na hora local.

trans-unit.source: You can use <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" /> to find all the currently valid certificates.
trans-unit.target: É possível usar o <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" /> para localizar todos os certificados válidos no momento.
